column1: Law, Regulation and the International Financial System MSc
column5: Study our MSc Law, Regulation and the International Financial System to discover the regulatory framework for international financial systems via legal and financial topics.Governments, regulators, and the financial industry have made major efforts to promote legal compliance and fair-dealing cultures within the financial sector. This has increased the demand for skilled graduates with knowledge in both law and finance.
